message: Member name not following naming convention - Name 'mColorPaint' must match pattern '^(([a-z]{2})|([x-z][A-Z]))[a-zA-Z0-9]*$'.
Member name not following naming convention - Name 'mBorderPaint' must match pattern '^(([a-z]{2})|([x-z][A-Z]))[a-zA-Z0-9]*$'.
Member name not following naming convention - Name 'mBackgroundPaint' must match pattern '^(([a-z]{2})|([x-z][A-Z]))[a-zA-Z0-9]*$'.
Member name not following naming convention - Name 'mBackgroundBitmap' must match pattern '^(([a-z]{2})|([x-z][A-Z]))[a-zA-Z0-9]*$'.
Member name not following naming convention - Name 'mHeigth' must match pattern '^(([a-z]{2})|([x-z][A-Z]))[a-zA-Z0-9]*$'.
Member name not following naming convention - Name 'mWidth' must match pattern '^(([a-z]{2})|([x-z][A-Z]))[a-zA-Z0-9]*$'.
